Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.recyclerview.binder

Class DynamicQueryBinder<T,​Q,​VH extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.recyclerview.binder.DynamicRecyclerViewBinder<VH>

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EmptyBinder, InfoBinder
    public abstract class DynamicQueryBinder<T,​Q,​VH extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder>
extends DynamicDataBinder<T,​VH>
    A DynamicDataBinder to bind the generic data with query that can be used with the DynamicBinderAdapter.
